bug.author: rsilveira79
bug.description:
Hello I'm using new Spacy (2.0.5) for NER extraction. I'm testing NER using both 'en', 'en_core_web_md' and 'en_core_web_lg'. For models 'en_core_web_md' and 'en_core_web_lg', I can run one time and load the models, but after some executions I started to have the error below. Can you help me with this? ops.pyx in thinc.neural.ops.NumpyOps.batch_dot() ValueError: shapes (7,0) and (300,128) not aligned: 0 (dim 1) != 300 (dim 0) <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
spaCy version: 2.0.5 Platform: Darwin-16.7.0-x86_64-i386-64bit Python version: 3.6.3 Models: en, en-large, en-lg, en-md, en_core_web_md

comments.comment: Thanks for the report. I think this is the same error as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/issues/1660>#1660</denchmark-link> , so closing this to keep the discussion in one place.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
